definition: short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: The leaders should observe the people's condition.
Being able to sense how others are feeling is an important part of having a good EQ.
sentences.chinese: 善於體察他人的情緒也是高情商的一個重要因素。

sentences.english: And you can't force happiness to happen—but you can make sure you are aware of it when it does.
sentences.chinese: 快樂無法強求，但一旦降臨，你要確信自己有所體察。

sentences.english: Do you see a need in someone's life that you can meet?
sentences.chinese: 你能體察到別人生命中的需要嗎？

sentences.english: Please understand how serious and urgent it is for us to resolve this matter.
sentences.chinese: 還望貴公司體察，儘快解決此迫切而嚴重的問題。
查爾斯對她的不安不予體察。

sentences.english: In those museums, visitors are allowed to operate the exhibits with their own hands, to observe and to experience carefully.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，觀衆可以自己去動手操作，自己細心體察。

definition: to sublimate/sublimation (physics)/to raise to a higher level/to refine/promotion
to sense/to perceive/to come to realize/to be aware
to put oneself in sb else's shoes
handling a butcher's cleaver with ease (idiom); to do sth skillfully and easily
to remove/to step back from involvement/to disengage
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
what is true and what is false/(to get to know) the real situation
